[Trigger Warning: Suicide]Wake up, DepEd and CHED!A 21-year-old female student, a resident of Zone 1, Sta. Elena, Iriga City, has died of suicide. According to PMSM Edward Dacara, investigator of the case, the parents are clueless that their daughter will die of suicide. According to the interview of Brigada News FM Bicol to the parents, the victim shared no problem aside from her problems in online learning. Aside from gadget-related problems, the victim had difficulties in signal and internet connections [1].This is already the third reported incident of education-relation suicide in Bicol region. Last June 16 and August 15, two students from Sto. Domingo, Albay also died of suicide [2]. These students never choose to end their lives; the government has failed them, the rotten Philippine educational system took their lives away.This frequency of suicide cases related to online classes must be enough for DepEd and CHED to heed the calls of students and teachers. In a hypothetical and perfect world, free internet is allowed. But the sad thing is, we're not in that world. hahahaha Anyway, bad intro. I'm no I.T. expert, but kailangan talagang pag-aaralan iyan. Correct me if I'm wrong. If lahat ng tao even mag-aaral at guro ay may free internet access, that will cause even slower internet access. It will also affect BPO companies, which obviously need internet para makapagtrabaho. Thus, telco companies need to upgrade their infastructure fast. Build more towers and infastructures. Upgrade equipments. All of that needs to be done fast. This is the time na dapat gamitin iyung other media such as radio and television. Example, why not give ABS-CBN their temporary franchise to broadcast in exchange, their network will be used to broadcast educational programs. Anyway they have educational programs in their wing, which had helped people like me before. Why not now?

We all know naman po kung paano niyo ginagawa lahat para lang maipatuloy ng estuyante ang pag aaral nila. Pero ang point lang naman po ay kung effective ba talaga ang e-learning. Magda dalawang buwan na kaming nag oonline. Pressure, sakit sa ulo at stress lang ang nararamdaman ko. Pressure kasi imbes magkakaintindi with comprehension ng mga lesson ay kakabahan ka kasi after that ay may quiz. Lalo na kapag asynchronous learning, kung saan self study kami, at yung lalabas na quiz ay iba sa nireview namin sa handouts. Minsan iiyak ka nalang at matutulala kasi di gaanong stable ang internet dito sa province namin. Putol putol minsan at ni screen share di makita. Yes, meron kaming internet, lahat na siguro ng klase ng internet ay na try na namin basta available dito sa lugar namin. Pero may time talaga na nawawala ang connection. Sakit ulo at mata ay nararamdaman ko, hamakin mong 6x a week kaming nag ka klase. At isa na subject ko ay parang pre board namin to know if we are eligible to purs

Greetings with peace!I am Romela Jane Anipot, 19 years old. I am a 2nd year college student taking up Bachelor in Secondary Education, Major in English at University of the Northern Philippines.I am humbly knocking from your kind hearts a small help as I try to raise funds in buying a laptop for my online class.Due to this anxiety-ridden pandemic, I was about to stop for this academic year due to financial matters and we can't afford to buy gadgets/electronics for my schooling since the mode of learning was shifted to the online class . My father is only helping his brother in farming while my mother is a housekeeper. I'm considering myself as the eldest among with my two little sisters who are upcoming Grade 1 and Grade 4. This is because my loving brother passed away last August, 2019 due to an accident at the age of 19.Ever since I was in elementary, I am studying well and wanted to excel in class. In my senior high school life, I graduated with high honors/valedictorian. Honestly,

Education all over the world is continuing despite the pandemic. Some are actually worse than the Philippines. May mga gustong magcontinue sa pagaaral despite the pandemic and yes may mga gustong magcontinue mahirap man or mayaman. It is your personal choice. Huwag din sana natin alisin ng right ang mga iba na gusto at willing na magcontinue ng pagaaral despite what is happening. All over the world parents are also sacrificing for the learning of thwir children pero wala naman issue sakanila? So bakit sa atin napakaling issue ang dapat sana na pagtigil ng pagaaral when in fact you have a choice not to enroll your child if you think na wala matututunan mga anak nio or kung sa akala nio kayo lang ang maghihirap para sa kanila. And para po sa gastos there are public schools na wala pong babayaran and offer modular approach of education. Iba iba lang po ang strategies na ibinibigay ng bawat bansa when it comes to education para magcontinue despite sa nangyayari. I hope you all appreciate t

OPISYAL NA PAHAYAGHunyo 8, 2020 - Nagpapasalamat kami sa Pangulo sa muling pagsasaalang-alang ng pambansang pamahalaan na tulungan kami sa aming pagsisikap na mag-alok ng mga alternatibo sa pag-aaral ng mukha sa kabila ng sitwasyon ng kalusugan sa publiko.Susundin namin ang direktiba ng Pangulo na ipagpaliban ang mga klase ng mukha sa mukha hanggang sa makukuha ang isang bakuna.Tiniyak namin sa aming mga magulang, mag-aaral, stakeholder, at Pangulo na inihahanda namin ang aming sarili para sa misyon na ito.Sa katunayan, isang hamon na gawain para sa amin sa Kagawaran ng Edukasyon na ihanda ang ating mga paaralan sa ibang set-up ngunit nakatuon tayo sa ating tungkulin na gawing magagamit at maunlad ang edukasyon, kahit na sa pinakamahirap na oras.Ang Kagawaran ay ganap na nakikibahagi sa paghahanda ng aming mga operasyon batay sa aming Batayang Edukasyon na Pag-aaral ng Pagpapatuloy ng Pag-aaral (BE-LCP), mula sa Central Office hanggang sa antas ng paaralan. Education all over the world is continuing despite the pandemic. Some are actually worse than the Philippines. May mga gustong magcontinue sa pagaaral despite the pandemic and yes may mga gustong magcontinue mahirap man or mayaman. It is your personal choice. Huwag din sana natin alisin ng right ang mga iba na gusto at willing na magcontinue ng pagaaral despite what is happening. All over the world parents are also sacrificing for the learning of thwir children pero wala naman issue sakanila? So bakit sa atin napakaling issue ang dapat sana na pagtigil ng pagaaral when in fact you have a choice not to enroll your child if you think na wala matututunan mga anak nio or kung sa akala nio kayo lang ang maghihirap para sa kanila. And para po sa gastos there are public schools na wala pong babayaran and offer modular approach of education. Iba iba lang po ang strategies na ibinibigay ng bawat bansa when it comes to education para magcontinue despite sa nangyayari. I hope you all appreciate t

Huwag din sana natin alisin ng right ang mga iba na gusto at willing na magcontinue ng pagaaral despite what is happening. All over the world parents are also sacrificing for the learning of thwir children pero wala naman issue sakanila? And para po sa gastos there are public schools na wala pong babayaran and offer modular approach of education. I guess a lot of students here doesn't realize that this is for College Students. CHED yan hindi DepEd. In College you prepare for the real life and in real life walang summer vacation, walang Christmas breaks (Holidays lang meron which is what 1-2 days) and leaves (Sick leave and Vacation leaves na as per law is 5 days only). Kung gusto mo ng mahaba habang vacation, wag ka mag enroll at in the future wag ka na mag hanap ng work! Lifetime vacation also known as tambay!

I guess a lot of students here doesn't realize that this is for College Students. CHED yan hindi DepEd. Sa mga nagcocomment na madaming bata ang maiiwan ngayong school year dahil walang gadget at internet, so ano damay damay na lang? Besides ang on-line instruction ay para lang sa mga may access sa internet...sa mga walang gadgets and internet connection, MODULES. Magbasa po tayo at wag sumabay lang sa mga comments ng mga nega. Simple lang yan, kung takot ka na baka mahawa ang anak mo sa virus, wag nyo ienroll...dun sa mga parents na inenroll nila ang mga anak nila, congrats po...anyway wala pa namang report ang WHO na on-line transmission at É??modularÉ?ù transmission ang covid-19 virus. Sa mga nagsasabing takot ang Deped na mawalan ng budget, hindi po usapin ng budget yan, ang usapin dyan ay pagpapatuloy ng nation building...at malaking bahagi po nyan ang edukasyon. Ang edukasyon, pagkatuto at ang pagtatatag at pagpapatuloy ng isang bansa ay di dapat tumigil.

Okey lang na mag adjust sila. Unang una. Nag pandemic naman. Di naman basta basta yung dumapong problema sa mundo at bansa. Lahat naman apektado. Maging nga yung nakatapos na ng pag aaral. At kasalukuya g nag tatrabaho at mga walang trabaho. At halos lahat ng mga nag susuffer dito kabilang ako. Sobra hirap. At hindi natin or ako din mapigilan yon. Kundi sumabay at pumilit bumangon. Dahil mahirap ikumpara yung nakasanayan dati sa bagong abnormal na pag haharap natin sa buhay. Wala talagang madali ngayon. Ang choice muna. As in É??MUNA!É?ù Natin eh mag tyaga. Atpiliting bumangon. Maging guro. Styudyante man, nag tattabahot nawala  ng trbaaho. Mismo ako. From regular na kumikita ng maayos. Biglang nawala. Atwalang magawa. Kundi tulungan sarili ko kesa umiyak at kag reklamo ng mag reklamo. At manisi ng manisi. At iAsa gobyerno ang kapalaran ko. Kaya ang choice ko eh mag sikap at mag patuloy. Sinamahan ko nalang ng positive na pag iisip. At tatag ng loob. Malalagpasan din nating lahat to. At sa

At kasalukuya g nag tatrabaho at mga walang trabaho. At halos lahat ng mga nag susuffer dito kabilang ako. Sobra hirap. At hindi natin or ako din mapigilan yon. Kundi sumabay at pumilit bumangon. Dahil mahirap ikumpara yung nakasanayan dati sa bagong abnormal na pag haharap natin sa buhay. Wala talagang madali ngayon. Ang choice muna. As in É??MUNA!É?ù Natin eh mag tyaga. Atpiliting bumangon. Maging guro. Styudyante man, nag tattabahot nawala  ng trbaaho. Mismo ako. From regular na kumikita ng maayos. Biglang nawala. Atwalang magawa. Kundi tulungan sarili ko kesa umiyak at kag reklamo ng mag reklamo. At manisi ng manisi. At iAsa gobyerno ang kapalaran ko. Kaya ang choice ko eh mag sikap at mag patuloy. I NEVER LIKED ONLINE LEARNING BECAUSE OF ITS OBVIOUS LIMITATIONS IN THE TEACHING-LEARNING PROCESS.I go with the idea that without the  Teacher , learning is not as effective as it should be.But under the present circumstamces, the best option is online education.Now, we are faced with a dilemma-to enrol or not to enrol, shades of Hamlet's, To Be Or Not To Be.The choice is yours.Why resort to cursing,maligning and crucifying our authorities?In life,not all things go our way and so we have to make the best out of the situation.Afterall, necessity fosters creativity and the best in man surfaces in times of crisis.With my zero knowledge in technology, I have to learn "painfully" how to navigate a browser.Computer is not my millieu, but I need to survive.I don't want the way of the dinosaurs-where?To  Extinction!

I NEVER LIKED ONLINE LEARNING BECAUSE OF ITS OBVIOUS LIMITATIONS IN THE TEACHING-LEARNING PROCESS.I go with the idea that without the  Teacher , learning is not as effective as it should be.But under the present circumstamces, the best option is online education.Now, we are faced with a dilemma-to enrol or not to enrol, shades of Hamlet's, To Be Or Not To Be.The choice is yours.Why resort to cursing,maligning and crucifying our authorities?In life,not all things go our way and so we have to make the best out of the situation.Afterall, necessity fosters creativity and the best in man surfaces in times of crisis.With my zero knowledge in technology, I have to learn "painfully" how to navigate a browser.Computer is not my millieu, but I need to survive.I don't want the way of the dinosaurs-where?To  Extinction!

I NEVER LIKED ONLINE LEARNING BECAUSE OF ITS OBVIOUS LIMITATIONS IN THE TEACHING-LEARNING PROCESS.I go with the idea that without the  Teacher , learning is not as effective as it should be.But under the present circumstamces, the best option is online education.Now, we are faced with a dilemma-to enrol or not to enrol, shades of Hamlet's, To Be Or Not To Be.The choice is yours.Why resort to cursing,maligning and crucifying our authorities?In life,not all things go our way and so we have to make the best out of the situation.Afterall, necessity fosters creativity and the best in man surfaces in times of crisis.With my zero knowledge in technology, I have to learn "painfully" how to navigate a browser.Computer is not my millieu, but I need to survive.I don't want the way of the dinosaurs-where?To  Extinction!

Mas mahirap po ang online class compared to face to face sa totoo lang :) bombarded po kami with a lot of activities, seatworks and more. "Due date/deadline" po palagi ang nasa utak namin kung may learnings man maliit na porsyento lang. Hirap pa sa internet connection lalo na kung naka data lang. Dagdag mo pa pisikal at emosyon naming mga nag aaral, okay lang sana kung gagawa lang kami "aral lang" ganon pero hindi e kasama yung pagod, iyak, puyat, lungkot, anxiety, gastos and more. Yung mental health namin pano na, hindi kami mamamatay sa covid sa online class naman. Sana iconsider nyo yung nangyayare ngayon at hindi pa kayo na ngamba na may mga nag suicide na students dahil sa online class dahil need nila ng materials and di nila afford. Paano naman po ang mga home school modular learning students na kailangan pumunta sa school ng mga magulang o guardian at pumila para lang makakuha ng mga modules na papagaralan ng mga bata? Hindi naman po kc lahat ay online, kaya hindi man makakapag face to face ang mga home school students, magsasakripisyo naman ang mga magulang oara lumabas, maswerte na kung walang kakapit na virus sa mga ppunta sa school para di madala sa bahay, yun po kc ang nakakabahala. Depende pa kung ilan ang estudyante mo na kailangan kuhanan ng modules tulad ko 2 beses sa isang linggo ako kailangan magpunta at pipila sa school para sa mga modules  ng mga anak ko. Paano naman po kami? Yun lang naman po ang concern, ok naman po kmi na kailangan mag aral ng mga bata, ang concern namin ang kalusugan ng bawat ppunta sa school ganun din mga teachers
